answers.answer: Yes I can barely walk at 34 weeks. I told my doctor today that my pelvic bones seemed bruised, he said the pain is from them stretching.

Same here 37w I feel like my bones are being ripped apart or something. It's an all day everyday thing also. I waddle like a penguin to walk. And according to my doctor my baby hasn't even dropped far enough. Can't imagine the pain when he does, If I go past my possible preeclampsia :(
Yes ive been dealing with this since about 34weeks im 36weeks now but it kind of feels like somebody hit me in the cucu with a hammer its really hard to walk
The doctor tokd me its just everything moving and getting ready for delivery

question: Ok so I'm 39 weeks on Wednesday.. I've been getting the worst pelvic pain for about 5 days. It's almost an all day thing & it's so uncomfortable... & sometimes makes it hard for me to walk. Is anyone else experiencing this & is there anything I can do to at least somewhat relieve this pain? :(
title: Pelvic pain
